response.original_title: Aliens in Atlantis: Portals to the Otherworld
response.overview: Across the world there are remnants and legends of a mystical past left undiscovered, until now. Traces of the legendary land of Atlantis have been identified in the form of mystical structures and monuments that contain metaphysical energies with the power to heal and generate portals to otherworldly dimensions. This lost chapter of mankind's history can finally be told.
response.title: Aliens in Atlantis: Portals to the Otherworld
